original_text: In that day there will be five cities in the land of Egypt that speak the language of Canaan and swear allegiance to the Lord of hosts. One of these will be called the City of Destruction.
korean_text: 그 날에 애굽 땅에 가나안 방언을 말하며 만군의 여호와를 가리켜 맹세하는 다섯 성읍이 있을 것이며 그 중 하나를 멸망의 성읍이라 칭하리라

sentences.original_text: there will be five cities in the land of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 애굽 땅에 다섯 성읍이 있을 것이라

sentences.original_text: that speak the language of Canaan
and swear allegiance to the Lord of hosts
will be called the City of Destruction
